text:
Write the equation of an ellipse given the center vertex and focus

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { Center }(0,0) \\\n\text { V ertex }(5,0) \\\n\text { Focus }(\sqrt{7}, 0)\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Center }(0,0) [/imath] [imath]\text { V ertex }(5,0) [/imath] [imath]\text { Focus }(\sqrt{7}, 0)[/imath]
